resources.string-array:
//kérdések
Knowing that in Italy the fixed telephone numbers have 10 digits whose the first is 0, how many numbers can we have?
The distance between two numbers in the Fibonacci sequence is 2 places. What is the quotient of the two numbers?
The perimeter proportion of two homothetic polygons equals 5. How many times is the area of the first polygon greater than the area of the second polygon?
If the first three Fibonacci numbers are given as 1, 1, 2 then what is the eleventh number?
It is known that 21% of the amount of milk is cream and 25% of the amount of cream is butter. Find out the amount of milk we need to obtain 52,5 kg butter?
The following sequence is given: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21. Determine the next 3 numbers in the sequence.
Which of the following sequences is a Fibonacci sequence?
How many solutions are there for a quadratic equation is the discriminant is negative?
Electrical power is measured in:
The frequency is measured in?
How long does it take for the Earth to orbit around itself?
What does RGB designate?
What is biggest?
The irrational magnitudes were discovered by
Archaeologists determined that in order to build the pyramids of Egypt, the pyramid builders needed an understanding of
How many bits has one byte?
What is the Golden Triangle?
What is the formula of Golden Ratio?
What kind of limit of Global Warming did the countries decided to set during the 2015 CCC in Paris?
How muh does the apache web server cost?
Which of the following foods needs the gratest amount of water per kilo:
Which is the 14th number of the Fibonacci sequence?
You know that the monthly growth of an idealized rabbit population follows the Fibonacci sequence (1, 1, 2, 3, 5, etc.). If you buy 8 rabbits, how many will they be after 8 months?
In which number system are colors coded in a computer?
Which colors does the RGB system use?
